title: 01/21/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/21/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP Talks to Ross Tucker who will be covering the Bucs/Rams game for Westwood One this weekend. Is it a bad thing that most of the public is behind the Rams? DP makes fun of Nick Wright's voice. And sideline reporter for the Rams' D'Marco Farr explains why teams passed on Aaron Donald in the draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
